DontPetSteeve.Description: Steeve is unable to be pet and won't get in the way of revives. Works for both U32 and 33

PepegaGunner.Description: Makes the Gunners Leadstorm super op, 99999 Ammo, 10000 rps, 1 Bullet Per Shot, No Recoil, No Spread, .25s Equip Duration, 10s Barrel Spindown, 10x Cooldown speed, No carve, 0.25s Overheat Duration, 1x Movement Speed, 200% Armor Breaking, and 200% Weakpoint Dmg.
